img.title: ğŸ“¸ Image Processing
img.instructions:
ğŸ“¸ **Image Processing Mode**

Please send your images (up to {max_images} files). You can send them one by one or all at once.

**Supported formats:** PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, WebP
**Max file size:** {max_size}MB per image

After uploading, type your instructions or 'done' to process.

Type 'cancel' to stop.

help.title: â“ Help
help.commands:
**Navigation Commands:**
â€¢ `/ls` - List files and directories
â€¢ `/cd <directory>` - Change to directory
â€¢ `/pwd` - Show current directory
â€¢ `/projects` - Show available projects

**Session Commands:**
â€¢ `/new` - Start new Claude session
â€¢ `/continue` - Continue last session
â€¢ `/status` - Show session status
â€¢ `/export` - Export session history

**DRACON System (Visual Modeling):**
â€¢ `/dracon help` - DRACON help
â€¢ `/dracon diagram <category> <file>` - ğŸ¨ Visual diagram
â€¢ `/dracon list [category]` - List schemas
â€¢ `/dracon analyze <yaml>` - Analyze schema
â€¢ `/refactor` - Reverse engineer code to DRACON

**Special Commands:**
â€¢ `/actions` - Show quick actions
â€¢ `/git` - Git repository commands
â€¢ `/claude` - Authorize Claude CLI
â€¢ `/img` - Image processing with Claude

**MCP Commands:**
â€¢ `/mcpadd` - Add MCP server
â€¢ `/mcplist` - List MCP servers
â€¢ `/mcpselect` - Select active context
â€¢ `/mcpask` - Query with MCP context
â€¢ `/mcpremove` - Remove MCP server
â€¢ `/mcpstatus` - MCP system status

**Scheduler:**
â€¢ `/schedules` - Task management
â€¢ `/add_schedule` - Add new task

**System Commands:**
â€¢ `/restart` - Restart bot

**Tips:**
â€¢ Send text files for viewing
â€¢ Use specific queries
â€¢ Check status with `/status`
